results.title: Ask an Australian about still water swimming [Greek version]
results.creator_credit: Artransa Park Studios and Peter Lake
results.brief_description: A Greek family is having a picnic by the river, and the father explains to his young son the dangers of swimming in still water. The film then shows the rescue methods relevant to swimming pools, rivers and calm beaches. Note: In Greek.
results.title_for_label: Ask an Australian about still water swimming [Greek version]

results.title: Ask an Australian about pedestrians [Turkish version]
results.creator_credit: Artransa Park Studios and Kay Roberts
results.brief_description: The numerous hazards facing a pedestrian in a busy Australian city are pointed out. The importance of observing signals, crossing on pedestrian overpasses or crosswalks, and carefully watching traffic are emphasised. Note: In Turkish.

results.title: Ask an Australian about her household [Turkish version]
results.creator_credit: Artransa Park Studios and Kay Roberts
results.brief_description: Shows the way of life common to an Australian housewife in her household management, and the goods, services and types of housing available - (1970’s point-of-view). Note: young male child nude in shower scene, may not be suitable for public screening. Note: In Turkish.
